welcome.clientSideNote: This app runs fully client-side and does not send any data to servers.

features.clientIDE: Fully client-side IDE (no server required, static hosting)
features.gitHistory: Git history, branch management and commit graph
features.languages: Multi-language highlighting: Cpp, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, etc.
features.mermaid: Real-time rendering of flowcharts and sequence diagrams with Mermaid
features.monaco: VS Code-like editing experience with Monaco Editor
features.nodeRuntime: Node.js runtime, npm, Unix commands and Git available in the browser
features.title: Key features of Pyxis

welcome.hmrHint: Try HMR and WebPreview by long-pressing the generated homepage folder.
welcome.indexeddbInfo: This project's files are stored in IndexedDB.
welcome.githubNote: GitHub integration has no known bugs to our knowledge, but avoid extreme actions such as using it on very large repositories or closing the browser mid-operation.

mainFeatures.importExport: Import, download files and zip export
mainFeatures.latex: LaTeX math rendering and Mermaid/HTML support
mainFeatures.theme: Theme color switching and multi-monitor support
mainFeatures.title: Main features

specialThanks.contributors: isomorphic-git, Monaco Editor, xterm.js, Mermaid, KaTeX, Pyodide and all OSS contributors.
specialThanks.title: Special Thanks

welcome.title: Welcome!
